channel.title: OpenCV on Mengoreo
channel.description: Recent content in OpenCV on Mengoreo

item.title: Core Functionality of OpenCV4
item.description: Mat - The Basic Image Container Mat is basically a class with two data parts: the matrix header (containing information such as the size of the matrix, the method used for storing, at which address is the matrix stored â€¦) and a pointer to the matrix data containing the pixe values. The matrix header size is constant, but the size of the matrix itself may vary. OpenCV uses a reference counting system.
